PageWidgetPortable.Title: Confirmadas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CM_ORDENSVENDA.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.STATUS=2 ) AND ( (A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO) OR ( (SELECT FILTRAUSUARIOOVINCLUIU FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE= @USUARIO) = 'N'))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1757_at2172_hsa67e485a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
